name: Spy Snatcher
description: Spy Snatcher is a floppy disk-based text adventure released by Topologika Software in 1991. It was the last professional text adventure to be released on the BBC Micro and Acorn Electron. It was also released for ZX Spectrum (+3 disk only), RISC OS, PC, Amstrad CPC, Amstrad PCW, Atari ST and Nimbus.[1]
